Transcription for 1215451

So you work here at People First. Are there people that you've met through your work
that you would consider a friend at all or that you get on with?
There is one person that I have made an effort to make friends with
and she seems to be a really, really nice person, a nice friend.
And yes, I have found one person and she's very similar to me, so I'm happy for her to be my friend.
How would you describe yourself when you say you want somebody like you? What would they be like?
Likes to go out, obviously meeting people. Likes to go to the cinema for meals and just have fun.
